<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Save Audiobooks for Current User"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v1/me/audiobooks"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Save one or more audiobooks to the current Spotify user's library.

**Note:** Authorization scopes- **user-library-modify**

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ids","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","example":"18yVqkdbdRvS24c0Ilj2ci,1HGw3J3NxZO1TP1BTtVhpZ,7iHfbu1YPACw6oZPAFJtqe"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Audiobook(s) are saved to the library","headers":{"Alt-Svc":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"h3=\":443\"; ma=2592000,h3-29=\":443\"; ma=2592000"}},"Content-Length":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"0"}},"Via":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"HTTP/2 edgeproxy, 1.1 google"}},"access-control-allow-credentials":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"true"}},"access-control-allow-headers":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Accept, App-Platform, Authorization, Content-Type, Origin, Retry-After, Spotify-App-Version, X-Cloud-Trace-Context, client-token, content-access-token"}},"access-control-allow-methods":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"GET, POST, OPTIONS, PUT, DELETE, PATCH"}},"access-control-allow-origin":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"*"}},"access-control-max-age":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"604800"}},"cache-control":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"private, max-age=0"}},"date":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Tue, 27 May 2025 16:05:30 GMT"}},"server":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"envoy"}},"strict-transport-security":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"max-age=31536000"}},"x-content-type-options":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"nosniff"}},"x-robots-tag":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"noindex, nofollow"}}},"content":{}}}}
